top_categories.workout_context: 53ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Reliance Tennessee Gravel's Appalachian foothills, Forest gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Reliance Tennessee Gravel's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before September.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Reliance Tennessee Gravel. Train it until it feels boring.
At Reliance Tennessee Gravel, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
75 miles on appalachian foothills gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Reliance Tennessee Gravel, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
When someone attacks on appalachian foothills gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Varied gradients on appalachian foothills gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on appalachian foothills gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.
Base fitness for Reliance Tennessee Gravel. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Reliance Tennessee Gravel’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Reliance Tennessee Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on appalachian foothills gravel to build confidence. Expect: appalachian foothills, forest gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 75 miles of appalachian foothills gravel in Reliance, Tennessee.
